com.netflix.genie.agent.execution.services

Interface JobMonitorService


  • public interface JobMonitorService
    Service that monitors the job directory and may decide to kill the job if some limit is exceeded. For example, if a file grows larger than some amount.
    Since:
    4.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void start(java.lang.String jobId, java.nio.file.Path jobDirectory)
      Starts the service.
      void stop()
      Stop the service.
